item.title: Books: 'Leave the Gun, Take the Cannoli'
The Voice in My Head
item.description: The Voice in My Head I’m reading a 1963 essay by James Bond author Ian Fleming, “How to Write a Thriller”, and I just realized that I hear it in my head as being read by George Sanders, ala his narration in “All About Eve”.
